properties.name: Marine Lake
properties.description: Used for the boat burning scene in series one. The lake is filled by high tides and offers views of the Bristol Channel.

properties.name: St Andrew's Church
properties.description: This 12th-century church was used as the fictional parish church of St Bede's in all three series.

properties.name: Salthouse Fields and Seafront
properties.description: The skate park and amusement arcade scenes from series one were filmed here.

properties.name: Hill Road (Broadchurch High Street)
properties.description: This thriving independent shopping area served as the main high street in the show, with many scenes filmed here.

properties.name: Helping Hands (Broadchurch Echo)
properties.description: This was a vacant shop that was transformed into the headquarters for the fictional newspaper, the Broadchurch Echo.

properties.name: Clevedon Pier
properties.description: Clevedon Pier often features prominently in establishing shots and as a backdrop, although much of the iconic beach scenes were filmed elsewhere. Where One Direction filmed You & I video.

properties.name: Miller Family House
properties.description: Ellie Miller's home, filmed at 12 St Andrew's Drive.

properties.name: Latimer Family House
properties.description: The home of the Latimer family, filmed at 1 Lavington Close.

properties.name: Marshall's Field
properties.description: Marshall's Field is a key location in the series, serving as a backdrop for several important scenes.

properties.name: Traders Hotel (Exterior)
properties.description: The exterior of the Traders Hotel, where Detective Inspector Hardy stayed, was filmed on Hill Road. The coordinates are an approximation of this location.
